info.name: Gmail - Unread/Read/Hover color: part2
info.description:
I really liked the idea of this one http://userstyles.org/styles/45948/gmail-unread-read-contrast-and-hover-highlight but it was left unfinished and hasn't been updated. Thus, I quickly fixed it and uploaded the new version here so that I wouldn't be nagged by Stylish about updating my modified style :D

The default colors are ones I felt went well with this style:
http://userstyles.org/styles/57755/the-return-of-old-gmail
